references.paper_title: Unsupervised deep image stitching: Reconstructing stitched features to images
references.reason: This paper introduces the UDIS method, which is used as a baseline and provides pre-trained models for the registration and fusion stages.
This paper introduces the UDIS++ method, which is another baseline and provides pre-trained models for the registration and fusion stages, and it also improves the UDIS method.

references.paper_title: Deep rectangling for image stitching: a learning baseline
references.reason: This paper introduces the DeepRectangling method, which is used as a baseline for the rectangling stage.
This paper introduces the foundation of diffusion models, which are crucial for the unified inpainting model proposed in this paper.
This paper provides the pre-trained large-scale diffusion model, which is the core component of the proposed method.
